settings.title: Need help? We’re here to save the day!

settings.question: What Footwear Should I Get?
settings.answer:
Let’s keep it simple. Ludic’s footwear range has four main collections: Eclipse, Nova, Enhanced Canvas, and Sliders. Here’s a quick guide:

Eclipse: Vegan suede low-top sneakers with rubber soles. They balance style and durability, ready for your day-to-day.

Nova: Made with vegan leather and a roomy fit, these sneakers offer classic style and comfort. They’re built to last, too, with sturdy rubber soles.

Enhanced Canvas: This collection brings suede and leather panels plus extra padding for comfort. These versatile shoes work for any occasion—work, gym, or casual meet-ups. Bonus: they come with an extra pair of laces for those quick style swaps.

Sliders: A pair for everyone in the house! With multiple color options, you might just want a pair for each family member.

Depending on your week, you might need two (or more!) pairs.

settings.question: Can you  give more information about specific product?
settings.answer: Of course! Reach out anytime if you need details on fit, materials, care, styling tips, or anything else about our products. Our customer service team is always ready to help, so don’t hesitate to ask.

settings.question: The  product I am looking for is out of stock. Will it be restocked?
settings.answer:
We’re sorry the style you’re eyeing is currently out of stock! At Ludic, we focus on fresh designs each season, so most styles are released just once. Occasionally, we make exceptions and restock certain sizes or popular styles.

To stay updated, follow us on social media for any restock news.

settings.question: When will I receive my order if it includes a pre-order item?
settings.answer: Pre-order items ship as soon as they’re available—check the product page or your order confirmation email for the expected date. If your order has both pre-order and in-stock items, the in-stock items will ship right away in a separate package, while the pre-order items will follow once they’re ready.

settings.question: What  size should I get?
settings.answer: We generally recommend ordering your regular shoe size, as Ludic products tend to run true to size. However, we suggest checking our sizing chart on each product page to ensure the best fit. If you're still unsure, don’t hesitate to reach out to our customer support team for extra help.

settings.question: Can I  get customizations on a product or a collection?
settings.answer: At the moment, we don’t offer customizations for individual orders or collections. However, if you're interested in bulk customizations, we’d be happy to work with you on designing and producing a dedicated batch. For custom orders, we require a minimum of 100 pieces for apparel and 500 pairs for footwear. For more details, just reach out to our customer support team!
